definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Shake with ice and strain over ice. Serve with a straw.
sentences.chinese: 加冰摇合原料，滤入冰块，置入吸管。

sentences.english: Instead, chew on a drinking straw or a coffee stirrer.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以，考虑一下饮料吸管或者搅咖啡的杓子。

sentences.english: Next to the CD case are two straws and two little black packets.
sentences.chinese: CD盒旁边有两根吸管和两个黑色小包。

sentences.english: Pour in shotglass. set on fire. drink through straw. scream!
sentences.chinese: 倒入子弹杯，点燃，用吸管饮用，奶油。

sentences.english: Shake with ice and strain over ice. Serve with a straw and swizzle-stick.
sentences.chinese: 加冰摇合原料，滤入冰块，置入吸管。

sentences.english: This bulk 25-pack of Straw 'C' is ideal for those with larger caseloads.
sentences.chinese: 大包装的吸管适用于工作量多的治疗师。

sentences.english: We can use a pooter to suck the smaller insects.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以用捕吸管来吸住微小的昆虫。

sentences.english: Transfers of liquid cultures can also be made by pipette .
sentences.chinese: 移植液体培养物可采用吸管。

sentences.english: The child likes to blow bubbles into water through a straw.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子喜欢用麦秆吸管往水里吹泡泡。

sentences.english: Many were wrapped in colored plastic straws.
sentences.chinese: 许多被包在彩色塑胶吸管里。

sentences.english: The Changjiang rub-river tunnel is designed as inverted siphon with drop shaft.
sentences.chinese: 长江过江隧道采用了竖井式倒虹吸管的布置形式。

sentences.english: After it stopped, a straw came down through the crack.
sentences.chinese: 声音停止时，一根吸管穿过裂缝伸了进来。

sentences.english: We'd push our straws through the silver caps and suck.
sentences.chinese: 我们用吸管戳过银色的薄瓶盖慢慢吮吸。

sentences.english: The emergency bilge suction is used to prevent flooding of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 紧急舱底水吸管，是用来防止船舶浸水的。

sentences.english: They suck soda water through straws tube.
sentences.chinese: 他们用麦秆状吸管喝汽水。
